    RuterMap

    public abstract class GenericMap
extends com.google.android.gms.maps.MapFragment
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
    Project: MapApp Package: no.wsact.mikand.pg4600.assignment2.MapApp.maps This class defines basic functionality for a map with an optional progressbar. I made it this way so I can expand with other map fragments.
    Version:
    12.05.15
    Author:
    Anders Mikkelsen

      • onMapReady

        public void onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
        This callback is called when the map is ready after initialization. In this callback i enable my location for the map and set my locationhandler as the source.
        Specified by:
        onMapReady in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback
